item.description:
You can check out the details on the race website here: http://www.doylesroadrace.com/

Another great thing is there's race-day registration available.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll figure out when and where to meet as the race day draws closer
item.why: This is my favorite Springtime Road Race. Doyles puts on a great race with nearly 2000 runners. The course is 5 miles over rolling hills through Franklin Park. Best of all there's Sam Adam's beer on tap for all finishers after the race.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Doyles Emerald Necklace Road Race
